title: Output gap forecast comparison UK from 2019 to 2023
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 2 lines denoting OBR, and IMF. The y axis indicates the Output gap and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall OBR is rapidly increasing, IMF is rapidly decreasing,  throughout the Year
OBR has increased by 100.00000001000001 percent.IMF has decreased by 0.0 percent.
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. OBR, and lastly, 2. IMF.
Overall across the Year, OBR mostly maintained the highest Output gap when compared to others with a mean value of -0.08, and it peaked at 2022, and 2023.
IMF mostly had the least Output gap with a mean value of 0.0, which peaked at 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022, and 2023 with a value of 0.0.
